sentences.sContent: We can separate the stones out with a sieve.
sentences.sContent_eng: We can separate the stones out with a sieve.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以用一个筛子把石头分离出来。

sentences.sContent: The next day the team began to sieve the loose, sandy silt around the spot—more hand bones and foot bones turned up.
sentences.sContent_eng: The next day the team began to sieve the loose, sandy silt around the spot—more hand bones and foot bones turned up.
sentences.sCn: 第二天，考察队开始在现场周围用筛子过滤松散的沙质粉土，他们又陆续发现了更多的手骨和足骨。

synos.tran: [粮食][矿业]筛子；滤网；不能保守秘密的人

remMethod.val: 用筛子(sieve)过一下是为了保留(save)精华

trans.tranOther: a round wire kitchen tool with a lot of small holes, used for separating solid food from liquid or small pieces of food from large pieces
to put flour or other food through a sieve
